com.btmatthews.ldapunit

Class DirectoryServerStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runners.model.Statement
      • com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerStatement

  • public class DirectoryServerStatement
extends org.junit.runners.model.Statement
    A Statement wrapper that launches an embedded LDAP directory server before executing the wrapped statement. The embedded LDAP directory server is shutdown after the wrapped statement has been executed.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectoryServerStatement(org.junit.runners.model.Statement stmt, DirectoryServerConfiguration cfg)
      Initialise the wrapper statement that starts an embedded LDAP directory server and shuts it down before and after executing the wrapped statement.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void evaluate()
      Start an embedded LDAP directory server before executing the wrapped statement and shutdown the LDAP directory server after the wrapped statement completes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectoryServerStatement

        public DirectoryServerStatement(org.junit.runners.model.Statement stmt,
                        DirectoryServerConfiguration cfg)
        Initialise the wrapper statement that starts an embedded LDAP directory server and shuts it down before and after executing the wrapped statement.
        Parameters:
        stmt - The wrapped statement.
        cfg - The directory server configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public void evaluate()
              throws Throwable
        Start an embedded LDAP directory server before executing the wrapped statement and shutdown the LDAP directory server after the wrapped statement completes.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in class org.junit.runners.model.Statement
        Throws:
        Throwable - If there was an error starting the server, executing the wrapped statement or shutting the wrapped server.
